headline: The Bond Buyer Debuts Legal Intelligence and Welcomes Jeff Lipton as Market Intelligence Analyst
summary: New York, Sept. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Arizent, a leading provider of market intelligence and business information, is pleased to announce that Jeff Lipton has joined as Market Intelligence Analyst, Municipals. In this role, Lipton will support The Bond Buyer’s award-winning editorial team and contribute to the company’s expanding Market Intelligence platform and services. Lipton brings over 25 years of experience in municipal credit and market strategy, most recently as Managing Director

headline: MetLife Joins Forces With Global Citizen to Drive Social Impact
summary: MET teams up with Global Citizen in a three-year initiative to expand education access, strengthen equity and create global social impact.
